elements.title: Luo Wenzao (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Luo Wenzao (pictured) became the first Catholic bishop from China in 1685, after initially declining the appointment in 1677?

elements.title: Otoskwin–Attawapiskat River Provincial Park (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that the Otoskwin–Attawapiskat River Provincial Park, protecting the Otoskwin and Attawapiskat Rivers in Ontario, Canada, has archaeological and historical sites dating from 3000 BC to the 1800s?

elements.title: films starring Angel Aquino (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Crying Ladies and Donsol, films starring Angel Aquino, were Philippine submissions for Best International Feature Film at the 77th and 80th Academy Awards, respectively?

elements.title: Adam Korsak (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that to learn the rules of American football, Australian Adam Korsak, who was named the best college punter in 2022, played Madden NFL 06 and watched Any Given Sunday?

elements.title: Monster Max (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that the Game Boy–released game Monster Max was considered by critics to be the closest in quality to The Legend of Zelda: Link's Awakening?

elements.title: Autovia C-13 (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that in 2019, a rockfall on the Spanish Autovia C-13 caused skiing holidays to be cancelled?

elements.title: Philippine Spanish (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that while Philippine Spanish has been described as an endangered language, a new generation of speakers has emerged?

elements.title: Ulysses S. Grant was arrested (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Ulysses S. Grant was arrested for speeding in his horse carriage when he was a general?
